root.name: Fengse Huanxiang
root.description: OverviewFengse Huanxiang is a strategy RPG developed and released in Taiwan in 1999. The game was re-released in 2004 with an expanded and higher quality concept art collection and information on the development of the game and the sequels which followed it.Fengse Huanxiang takes place in a generic but fully-realized fantasy setting, using an anime-inspired art style. The story of the game involves the awakening of an ancient evil and a band of adventurers who must stop it. The gameplay is a standard turn-based strategy, with an RPG-like character progression system, including a job system which allows for higher levels of customization.The game was popular enough to lead to the game becoming a franchise, with several more strategy RPGs released in Taiwan and in mainland China. In 2010, an MMORPG was released based on the series, released in Taiwan, China, Japan and Malaysia.
